mapper.sql: id, parent_id,style_name, pic_id, price, size, requirement, creater_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time
mapper.select: select a.id, a.parent_id,a.style_name, a.pic_id, a.price, a.size, a.requirement,b.url from h_advertising_style a left join h_pic_video b on a.pic_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.parent_id,a.style_name, a.pic_id, a.price, a.size, a.requirement,b.url from h_advertising_style a left join h_pic_video b on a.pic_id = b.id where a.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into h_advertising_style (id, parent_id,style_name, pic_id, price, size, requirement, creater_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{styleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update h_advertising_style
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
style_name = #{styleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
requirement = #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update h_advertising_style set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, style_name = #{styleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requirement = #{requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
